smax1.Name: maximum soil water holding capacity of 1st soil layer, as % of defined soil depth

scaleFan.Name: scaling for rooting depth data to obtain smax2
scaleFan.Comment: Scaling parameter for Rooting Depth of Fan et al. 2017

scaleYang.Name: scaling for rooting depth data to obtain smax2
scaleYang.Comment: Scaling parameter for Rooting Depth of Yang et al. 2016

scaleWang.Name: scaling for root zone storage capacity data to obtain smax2
scaleWang.Comment: Scaling parameter for root zone storage capacity of Wang-Erlandsson et al. 2016

scaleTian.Name: scaling for plant avaiable water capacity data to obtain smax2
scaleTian.Comment: Scaling parameter for plant avaiable water capacity of Tian et al. 2019

smaxTian.Name: value for plant avaiable water capacity data where this is NaN
smaxTian.Comment: value for plant avaiable water capacity of Tian et al. 2019 where this is NaN

devStage.comment: experimental: try-out, tested: runs and produces sane output, consolidated: tested and used for scientific purpose, published: for published approach
